title: When is Challenger Ahri Going To Come Back?
body:
I'm not sure if challenger ahri is coming back or not although it says in the store skin unavailable my friends say that she will come back is this true or not?
PLEASE I REALLY WANT THAT SKIN!

replies.body: Challenger Ahri is a legacy skin. That is, it's in the legacy skin vault, which is opened on special events. Basically, if the announcement for a particular event says "legacy vault open", then you'll be able to buy that skin like normal.
